ARABIC: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن قَبْلِكَ مِن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا نُوحِىٓ إِلَيْهِ أَنَّهُۥ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱعْبُدُونِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We sent no Messenger before you without revealing to him: 'There is no god but Me, so worship Me.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We have not sent an apostle before you without instructing him that there is no god but I, so worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Never did We send any Messenger before you to whom We did not reveal: "There is no god but Me. So serve Me alone."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: To all the Messengers that were sent before you We revealed that I am the only God to be worshipped.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We did not send any Noble Messenger before you, but We divinely revealed to him that, “There is no God except I (Allah), therefore worship Me alone.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We did not send any Messenger before you but We revealed to him (saying): "There is no God but I, so worship Me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We did not send before you any apostle but We revealed to him that there is no god but Me, therefore serve Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And We sent never a Messenger before thee except that We revealed to him, saying, 'There is no god but I; so serve Me.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We sent no messenger before thee but We inspired him, (saying): There is no Allah save Me (Allah), so worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We sent all messengers before you with this revelation: "There is no deity save Me, so worship Me alone."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We sent not before thee an apostle but We revealed unto him that there is no god but I, so worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We did not send any apostle before you but that We revealed to him that ‘There is no god except Me; so worship Me.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Not a messenger did We send before thee without this inspiration sent by Us to him: that there is no god but I; therefore worship and serve Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We did not send any Messenger before you (O Muhammad SAW) but We inspired him (saying): La ilaha illa Ana [none has the right to be worshipped but I (Allah)], so worship Me (Alone and none else)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We never sent a Messenger before you except that We revealed to him saying: 'There is no god except Me, therefore, worship Me'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We never sent a messenger before you without inspiring him that: “There is no god but I, so worship Me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We sent not before you any messenger except that We revealed to him that, "There is no deity except Me, so worship Me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:25] And We did not send any Messenger before you but We revealed to him (read nūhī or yūhā, ‘[but] it was revealed to him’) that, ‘There is no god except Me, so worship Me’, that is, affirm My Oneness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We sent no messenger before you) Muhammad (but We inspired him) tell your people that they should say: (There is no God save Me (Allah), so worship Me) so declare My divine Oneness.
